title: Glock: How Pop Culture Helped Build The World’s Most Popular Pistol - Loadout
description: The Glock is the most popular pistol in the world, so it’s no surprise that this pistol has been a trusty sidearm in dozens of video games, including Half-Life, Counter-Strike, and Call of Duty. It’s a pistol that has enjoyed a huge amount of pop culture attention, but the weapon has also been surrounded by its fair share of myths and tropes.
